item.title: 网络攻击数月后，M&S 全面恢复在线服务
item.description: 在网络攻击给这家英国服装和食品零售商造成混乱近四个月后，玛莎百货集团公司（Marks & Spencer Group Plc）恢复了全系列商品的在线送货服务。【原文：Marks & Spencer Group Plc has reinstated online delivery on its full range of items, nearly four months after a cyberattack caused chaos for the British clothing and food retailer.】

item.title: 在 CPI 数据公布前，S&P 500 指数的 "滞胀剧本 "焕然一新
item.description: 当滞胀的幽灵在股市中荡漾时，投资者正在关注即将公布的消费者通胀报告，以了解这一可怕的经济情景距离成为现实还有多远。【原文：As the specter of stagflation ripples through equity markets, investors are zeroing in on the upcoming consumer inflation report to see how close the dire economic scenario is to becoming a reality.】

item.title: 美联储减息猜测加剧，国债收益率在 CPI 前下滑
item.description: 国债收益率下滑，原因是投资者在为美国通胀率的关键数据做准备，该数据可能会支持美联储下月降息。【原文：Treasury yields slipped as investors brace for a key reading of US inflation that may bolster the case for the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates next month.】

item.title: 收益率下降，安哥拉考虑重返欧洲债券市场
item.description: 安哥拉很可能重返国际债务市场，尽管很可能不是在今年，因为这个石油资源丰富的国家的欧元债券收益率继续从迫使其推迟发行计划的历史高点回落。【原文：Angola will likely return to international debt markets, although probably not this year, as yields on the oil-rich nation’s eurobonds continue to ease from record highs that forced a delay of planned issuance.】

item.title: 亚航 X 将开通伊斯坦布尔航班，再次进军欧洲市场
item.description: 马来西亚亚航（AirAsia X Bhd）将从 11 月起开通直飞土耳其的航班，重启这家东南亚廉价航空公司飞往欧洲和建立全球廉价航空公司网络的雄心。【原文：Malaysia’s AirAsia X Bhd is set to launch non-stop flights to Turkey from November, rebooting the Southeast Asian budget carrier’s ambitions to fly to Europe and establish a global low-cost carrier network.】

item.title: 支付特朗普关税的美国小企业每年将面临 2020 亿美元的损失
item.description: 美国小公司近年来创造了美国一半以上的就业岗位，但它们正竭力遵守唐纳德-特朗普总统的新关税政策，应对进口成本上涨给它们带来的日益严重的财务压力。【原文：Small US companies, the source of more than half of the country’s job creation in recent years, are struggling to comply with President Donald Trump’s new tariffs and cope with growing financial strains clobbering them from higher import costs.】

item.title: 印尼表示将推迟启动更高的生物柴油混合计划

item.description: 根据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）的研究，唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税对消费者价格的影响才刚刚开始，这给因对降息步伐的押注不断变化而陷入困境的国债市场增添了更多的不确定性。【原文：The impact of President Donald Trump’s tariffs on consumer prices is just getting started, according to research by Goldman Sachs Group Inc., adding more uncertainty to a Treasury market that has been gripped by shifting bets on the pace of interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 沙特工业生产增至 2022 年末以来最高水平
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的工业生产上升到近三年来最强劲的水平，与同期沙特经济增长同步，并受到石油产量扩大的推动。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s industrial production rose to the strongest level in nearly three years, in line with an increase in the kingdom’s economic growth for the same period and driven by an expansion in oil output.】

item.title: ICICI 投资银行主管萨拉夫将转投零售经纪业务

item.title: 印度央行据称已出售至少 50 亿美元以提振卢比
item.description: 据熟悉交易情况的人士称，印度央行本月在在岸和离岸货币市场上抛售美元，以支撑卢比，因为卢比正朝着创纪录的低点疲软。【原文：India’s central bank sold US dollars across both onshore and offshore currency markets this month to prop up the rupee as it weakened toward a record low, according to people familiar with the transactions.】

item.title: KKR 对英国房东长达 10 个月的追逐迎来最后决战
item.description: 在 KKR & Co. 首次登门拜访约 10 个月后，这家英国最大的上市医疗保健业主的命运即将被决定，其结果岌岌可危，其影响可能远远超出一场单一的收购战。【原文：About 10 months after KKR & Co. first came knocking, the fate of the UK’s largest publicly traded healthcare landlord is about to be decided, with the outcome on a knife edge and implications that could extend far beyond a single takeover battle.】

item.title: Zetrix 利用 DeepSeek 知识为穆斯林推出人工智能聊天机器人

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：股市保持稳定，英镑逼近 1.35 美元

item.description: 在美元走软的支撑下，发展中市场的股票和货币纷纷走高，因为交易员们正关注美国的数据，这些数据可能会进一步巩固对美联储降息的押注。【原文：Stocks and currencies in developing markets are moving higher, bolstered by a weaker dollar as traders focus on data in the US which could further cement bets on interest-rate cuts by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 据说新加坡忍者车公司在最新一轮融资中将估值减半
item.description: 物流初创企业 Ninja Van 正在洽谈内部融资，这将使其估值降低一半左右，这是科技公司在东南亚融资寒冬中艰难前行的最新迹象。【原文：Logistics startup Ninja Van is in talks to raise an internal round which will slash its valuation by about half, the latest sign of tech companies struggling to navigate the funding winter plaguing Southeast Asia.】
